Article Title: Anand Mahindra: ... Now that‚Äôs what you call a role model
Article Text:
Here‚Äôs what Anand Mahindra wrote on X

How X users praised Rahul Dravid

Anand Mahindra is all praise for Team India‚Äôs outgoing coach Rahul Dravid who led the team to victory in the T20 World Cup 2024. Dravid was awarded an extra bonus of Rs 2.5crore by the Board of Control for Cricket in India ( BCCI ) over the rest of his staff that include bowling coach Paras Mhambrey, fielding coach T Dilip, and batting coach Vikram Rathore.However, he rejected the money as he wanted equal pay for his support staff.Mahindra has praised Dravid for this class act. He took to microblogging site X (formerly Twitter) to express his admiration for the former coach.‚ÄúThe mark of a man‚Ä¶Now THAT‚Äôs what you call a role model. üëèüèΩüëèüèΩüëèüèΩ,‚Äù he wrote in the X post.Commending Dravid‚Äôs conduct, an X user wrote ‚ÄúRahul Dravid the man with integrity who gave away 2.5 crore üôè He was given 5 crore bonus along with 14 players and the supporting team got 2.5 crore each. Dravid took only 2.5 crore saying he wants to be paid on par with his team. He did the same when he was coach of U19 worldcup team.‚ÄùAnother X user called him a ‚Äòtrue living legend‚Äô. He wrote ‚ÄúMy cricketing Hero, for reasons like this he is, Rahul Dravid refused to take an extra bonus of Rs 2.5 crore for the T20 World Cup triumph. Dravid took the call to ensure all the members of the support staff of the senior men's team were rewarded with equal bonus prizes.‚Äù
Article Summary: Rahul Dravid was awarded an extra bonus of Rs 2.5crore by the Board of Control for Cricket in India ( BCCI ) over the rest of his staff. He rejected the money as he wanted equal pay for his support staff. Anand Mahindra took to microblogging site X to express his admiration for the former coach.

Article Title: Apple makes it easier to switch from Google Photos to iCloud Photos, here‚Äôs how
Article Text:
Here's how the new tool streamlines the transition

Switching from Google Photos to iCloud Photos just got significantly smoother. Thanks to a new data transfer tool developed collaboratively by Apple and Google, migrating your cherished memories is now a seamless process.Previously, transferring photos and videos from Google Photos to iCloud Photos involved a cumbersome manual download and upload process.This often discouraged users from switching, despite the potential benefits of iCloud Photos' integration with Apple devices.The new data transfer tool signifies a welcome collaboration between Apple and Google. This initiative, known as the Data Transfer Initiative , aims to empower users with more control over their data by simplifying the process of transferring information between different services.- Users can initiate the transfer directly within Google Takeout , Google's service for exporting data.- By selecting "Apple - iCloud Photos" as the destination, users can securely transfer their entire Google Photos library, including albums and descriptions, straight to iCloud Photos.- No need for manual downloads or uploads - the transfer happens seamlessly between the two services.While the transfer process is simplified, it's important to note that the original photos and videos remain in your Google Photos account unless you manually delete them after the transfer is complete. Additionally, the transfer time may vary depending on the size of your photo library.
Article Summary: New data transfer tool was developed collaboratively by Apple and Google. Users can securely transfer their entire Google Photos library, including albums and descriptions, straight to iCloud Photos. No need for manual downloads or uploads - the transfer happens seamlessly between the two services.

Article Title: What Microsoft leaving board seat at ChatGPT maker OpenAI means for Apple
Article Text:
What's behind Microsoft giving up board seat

In a sudden move, Microsoft announced its exit from ChatGPT maker OpenAI's board. Microsoft held an observer role on OpenAI's board. The company informed OpenAI the same in a letter. Microsoft has invested $13 billion in OpenAI. The company has been integrating OpenAI's tech across its Windows portfolio.Post Microsoft announcement, OpenAI spokesperson said that the startup won‚Äôt have board observers after Microsoft‚Äôs departure.There were reports that Apple was due to take up a similar role as Microsoft in OpenAI. At its recent annual developers conference, WWDC2024, Apple announced an AI partnership with OpenAI. Apple would not take the observer role on OpenAI's board after being widely expected to do so, the Financial Times reported, citing a person with direct knowledge of the matter.Microsoft took a non-voting, observer position on OpenAI's board in November 2023 after OpenAI CEO Sam Altman was fired unceremoniously. He was taken back just hours later in a management reshuffle that also saw board shakeup. The seat meant that Microsoft could attend OpenAI's board meetings and access confidential information but had no voting rights on matters including selecting or choosing directors. Apple joining the board would have meant the same rights for the iPhone maker."We‚Äôre grateful to Microsoft for voicing confidence in the board and the direction of the company, and we look forward to continuing our successful partnership,‚Äù OpenAI said in a statement to Bloomberg News. Apple‚Äôs partnership with OpenAI brings ChatGPT to iPhones.Microsoft has relinquished its board seat after regulatory pressure in Europe and the US. Last month, European Union (EU) antitrust regulators said that the partnership between Microsoft and OpenAI would not be subjected to the bloc's merger rules because Microsoft does not control OpenAI, but they would instead seek third-party views on the exclusivity clauses in the agreement.The British and US antitrust watchdogs too continue to have concerns as well as questions about Microsoft's influence over OpenAI and the latter's independence. In January, the US Federal Trade Commission said it was looking into Microsoft‚Äôs investment in OpenAI as part of a broader inquiry into Big Tech companies and their partnerships with AI startups.
Article Summary: Microsoft announced its exit from ChatGPT maker OpenAI's board. Microsoft held an observer role on the board. The company informed OpenAI the same in a letter. OpenAI spokesperson said that the startup won't have board observers after Microsoft‚Äôs departure.

Article Title: This Google's business is valued at double of Netflix and how analysts feel it can 'AI-proof' the company's search business
Article Text:
YouTube can help protect Google from AI risks to its search business

Investors reportedly value Google parent Alphabet Inc at a staggering $2.3 trillion, recognizing its dominance in internet search and its pioneering role in artificial intelligence. However, according to a report in Bloomberg, analysts at Needham & Co. argue that this massive figure still fails to capture the true worth of YouTube , a subsidiary of Alphabet.In a recent note, Laura Martin and Dan Medina from Needham estimated YouTube's standalone value to be at least $455 billion, exceeding Netflix 's market cap by more than half. Alphabet's current structure, they argue, doesn't adequately reflect the value of its diverse businesses, particularly YouTube. They recommend buying Alphabet stock and have set a price target of $210, a 10% increase over its July 5th record close."There's hidden value in YouTube that can't be traded separately," Martin explained in a separate interview, as per Bloomberg report. "It's trapped within Google, a conglomerate facing various risks," she added, citing concerns about AI potentially disrupting search, a threat "unrelated to YouTube." Needham believes that separating YouTube would benefit investors interested in either its streaming dominance or Alphabet's role in AI. Even making just 5% of YouTube tradable could raise Alphabet's stock price by $15 per share, according to their analysis.Martin argues that conglomerates often struggle to attract investors because some might be interested in specific parts but not the entire company.Alphabet's complex structure has been criticized for obscuring the value of its individual businesses. Regulatory threats to break up the company have, in fact, been welcomed by many investors. However, Quincy Krosby, chief global strategist at LPL Financial, suggests that there's little indication of Alphabet or other tech giants considering such separations anytime soon.Meanwhile, YouTube's streaming dominance continues to grow as consumers shift away from traditional cable and broadcast TV. Ad revenue for the platform is projected to reach $37 billion in 2024 and $42 billion in 2025, reflecting a near 17% and 14% increase, respectively.While AI has been a major driver of Alphabet's recent stock surge, YouTube's role within the "subscriptions, platforms and devices" segment is a key growth engine and a rising contributor to overall revenue, as highlighted by Goldman Sachs analysts. They've reiterated their buy rating on Alphabet and increased their price target to $211, partly due to their revised, optimistic assumptions about YouTube's ad revenue growth.There are additional reasons for Alphabet to hold onto YouTube. Divyaunsh Divatia, an analyst at Janus Henderson Investors, considers YouTube a "key pillar" of Alphabet's AI strategy. He emphasizes the benefit YouTube derives from being part of the Google Web services ecosystem, while calling for more transparency from Alphabet to allow investors to better assess YouTube's growth drivers and value.Beyond YouTube, Needham's Martin believes there's value in potentially separating other Alphabet segments, such as its ad tech unit, currently facing a lawsuit from the US Department of Justice. In Martin's view, "Alphabet is worth more in pieces than it is together."
Article Summary: Investors reportedly value Google parent Alphabet Inc at a staggering $2.3 trillion. But analysts at Needham & Co. argue that this figure still fails to capture the true worth of YouTube. Needham believes that separating YouTube would benefit investors interested in either its streaming dominance or Alphabet's role in AI.

Article Title: Adult content website XNXX is facing this deadline in EU
Article Text:
The deadline and what it means for XNXX

The European Union (EU) has designated another adult content website as a very large online platform ( VLOP ), which means that the platform will need to implement stricter measures to tackle illegal and harmful content .After Pornhub, Stripchat and XVideos , which gained the status in December 2023, XNXX becomes the fourth porn site to be named VLOP.‚ÄúToday, the Commission has formally designated XNXX as a Very Large Online Platform (VLOP) under the Digital Services Act (DSA),‚Äù the commision said.‚ÄúXNXX is an adult content platform with an average of more than 45 million monthly users in the European Union. This user number, which XNXX has communicated to the Commission, is above the DSA threshold for designation as a VLOP,‚Äù it added.The European Commission is taking a tougher stance on online platforms under the new laws, requiring platforms to conduct regular risk assessments and implement clear mitigation strategies to curb the spread of illegal and harmful content online.Since XNXX is designated as VLOP, it will have four months to comply with the DSA‚Äôs rigorous standards.‚ÄúFollowing today's designation as a VLOP, XNXX will have to comply with the most stringent rules under the DSA within four months of its notification (i.e. by mid-November 2024),‚Äù the commission said.‚ÄúSuch obligations include adopting specific measures to empower and protect users online, to prevent minors from accessing pornographic content online, including with age-verification tools, to provide access to publicly available data to researchers, and to publish a repository of ads,‚Äù it added.Failure to comply with these regulations could result in hefty fines for these companies, reaching up to 6% of their global annual revenue. The latest designation brings the total designated VLOPSEs under the DSA to 25.
Article Summary: XNXX becomes the fourth porn site to be named VLOP. The European Commission is taking a tougher stance on online platforms under the new laws. XNXX will have four months to comply with the DSA‚Äôs rigorous standards.

Article Title: Flipkart is adding these new bill payment, recharge options on its app
Article Text:
Flipkart UPI launched

Flipkart parted ways with PhonePe in 2022

Flipkart is expanding its recharge and bill payment options in its app. Users can now recharge their Fastags, DTH, landline, broadband and postpaid mobile bills alongside shopping on Flipkart. This comes months after the e-commerce platform announced UPI integration on the app.This service integrates with the Bharat Bill Payment System (BBPS), a system managed by the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI).This allows users to conveniently manage your bills while shopping online.We at The Times of India spotted it on a banner on the app and found multiple ‚Äúnew‚Äù options under it.Earlier this year, the Walmart-owned company launched its UPI handle, powered by Axis Bank, for Android users. Users can set up their own UPI handle for online and offline merchant transactions within and outside of the Flipkart marketplace, the company said.Flipkart users can use Flipkart UPI to pay for any product or service including e-commerce transactions, recharges and bill payments. Flipkart is competing with its rival Amazon ‚Äì which runs its own payment verticalAmazon Pay ‚Äì as well as other payment firms like Paytm, PhonePe and Google Pay.‚ÄúFlipkart UPI stands poised to substantially impact India's digital payments system, aligning to the vision of the digital economy while strategically addressing the surging adoption of digital payments and providing an opportunity for millions of new users to avail the advantages of the UPI ecosystem,‚Äù the company said at that time.It is to be noted that Flipkart separated from PhonePe, which it acquired in 2016, in December 2022. However, Walmart continues to remain the parent company of both Flipkart and PhonePe.
Article Summary: Flipkart is expanding its recharge and bill payment options in its app. Users can now recharge their Fastags, DTH, landline, broadband and postpaid mobile bills. This comes months after the e-commerce platform announced UPI integration on the app.

Article Title: Panasonic launches LUMIX S9 compact full-frame camera in India
Article Text: Panasonic's LUMIX S9, the lightest and smallest (403g) in its series, features a 24.2 MP CMOS sensor, Phase Detection Auto-Focus, and Active Image Stabilisation. Priced at Rs 1,49,990 (body) and Rs 1,79,990 (kit). Four colours available. LUMIX Lab app for iOS, Android enables fast editing. Features REAL TIME LUT, free-angle screen, and MP4 Lite recording for social media.
Article Summary: Panasonic's LUMIX S9 is the lightest and smallest (403g) in its series. It features a 24.2 MP CMOS sensor, Phase Detection Auto-Focus, and Active Image Stabilisation. Priced at Rs 1,49,990 (body) and ¬£1,79,990 for the kit.

Article Title: Wordle 1117 Puzzle for July 10, 2024: Hints, clues and solution for word of the day
Article Text:
Wordle 1117 Hints and Clues for July 10, 2024

Today‚Äôs word of the day starts with the alphabet G.

There are two vowels in today‚Äôs word of the day.

No alphabet is repeated in today‚Äôs word.

Today‚Äôs word ends with the vowel T.

Alphabet N is also present in today‚Äôs word.

Wordle 1117, July 10, 2024: Word of the Day

Wordle, the popular word-guessing game that has taken the world by storm, continues to challenge players with its cryptic puzzles. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned Wordle aficionado or a newbie trying to crack the code, we‚Äôve got you covered. Let‚Äôs dive into today‚Äôs hints and uncover the elusive answer!Wordle, a brain-child of Josh Wardle, a Brooklyn-based software engineer has become a daily ritual for many.Since its debut in 2021, the word game has gained popularity among users, with NewYork Times buying it in 2022.Users are greeted with a new word puzzle everyday that can easily be cracked using elimination hints. Each player gets only six chances to solve the puzzle.Today‚Äôs Wordle 1117 promises a puzzle that tests your linguistic skills, likely to be decoded by many participants. To assist you in solving the puzzle, we've curated a fresh array of hints and clues for today's Wordle challenge.Are you ready for another round of the super fun Wordle puzzle game?Whether you have cracked the code or are still working with the hints, it is now time to reveal the answer. Article Title: Chandigarh woman loses Rs 80 lakh to SIM card scam: Here‚Äôs what happened
Article Text:
How the scam unfolded?

How to check SIM cards registered on your Aadhaar Card?

Visit the TAFCOP website: https://tafcop.sancharsaathi.gov.in/telecomUser/

Enter your Mobile number in the given box

Next, enter the captcha and click on ‚Äúrequest OTP.‚Äù

Enter the OTP you have received on your number and click on ‚ÄúLogin.‚Äù

You will see a list of mobile numbers registered on your ID.

Check and ensure that all the active mobile numbers belong to you or to your relatives

In case of any doubt, this website gives 03 options; ‚ÄúNot my number‚Äù, ‚ÄúNot required‚Äù and ‚ÄúRequired‚Äù.

You can report a number that is registered with your ID and does not belong to any of your family members by clicking ‚ÄúNot my number‚Äù.

A Chandigarh resident lost Rs 80 lakh after she received a call from fraudsters posing as a police officer. The caller told her that a SIM card in her name was allegedly being used in illegal activities. The victim, fearing arrest, agreed to the caller‚Äôs demand and transferred the money, reports Tribune India.A case has been registered with the cybercrime police station.The victim is a resident of sector 11, Chandigarh. She told police that she received a call from a person who pretended to be a police officer with the Crime Branch in Mumbai. The caller told her that a SIM card issued against her Aadhaar card was used in illegal money laundering activities.The fraudster asserted that they have received 24 money laundering complaints against her, further threatening her with an arrest. Fearing arrest, the victim followed the caller‚Äôs direction who demanded Rs 80 lakh which was to be returned if the woman was found innocent.The woman eventually transferred Rs 80 lakh to ‚Äòclear the case‚Äô, only to realize later that she had been scammed.The Department of Telecommunication (DoT) launched a web portal called Telecom Analytics for Fraud Management & Consumer Protection or TAFCOP to check SIM cards issued under one ID. Here‚Äôs how to do it
Article Summary: A Chandigarh resident lost Rs 80 lakh after she received a call from fraudsters posing as a police officer. The caller told her that a SIM card in her name was allegedly being used in illegal activities. The victim, fearing arrest, agreed to the caller‚Äôs demand and transferred the money.

Article Title: Asus launches India's first CoPilot+ PC, the Vivobook S 15 OLED, with Qualcomm‚Äôs Snapdragon X Elite processor and AI features
Article Text:
Asus Vivobook S 15 OLED with Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite: Price, availability in India

Asus Vivobook S 15 OLED with Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite: Specifications, features, and more

Asus has launched India's first CoPilot+ PC, the Vivobook S 15 OLED, featuring Qualcomm‚Äôs Snapdragon X Elite Processor. Here‚Äôs all you need to know about the Vivobook S 15 OLED.Priced at INR 1,24,990, the Vivobook S 15 OLED is now available on Flipkart, Asus e-shop, and other retail channels.The Vivobook S 15 OLED boasts a 15.6-inch 3K 120Hz Asus Lumina OLED display, offering vibrant visuals with a 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut and VESA DisplayHDR True Black 600 certification.The laptop measures at 1.47cm in thickness and weighs 1.42kg.At the heart of the new laptop is the Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite Processor with Adreno integrated graphics, complemented by 16GB LPDDR5X RAM and a 1TB PCIe 4.0 SSD. The Snapdragon X Elite processor features Qualcomm‚Äôs Hexagon NPU, promising 45 TOPS of neural processing prowess. The laptop offers up to 18 hours of battery life with 90W USB Type-C fast charging.The Vivobook S 15 OLED comes equipped with a range of connectivity options, including USB4 ports supporting 4K display output and 40 GB/s data transfer.The laptop also features military-grade MIL-STD 810H durability. The VivoBook S15 also incorporates Asus IceCool thermal technology for efficient heat dissipation and Asus Antimicrobial Guard for added hygiene protection. It comes with Windows Hello face recognition supported by a 1080p Full HD 3DNR webcam.
Article Summary: The Vivobook S 15 OLED boasts a 15.6-inch 3K 120Hz Asus Lumina OLED display. The laptop measures at 1.47cm in thickness and weighs 1.42kg. Qualcomm‚Äôs Hexagon NPU promises 45 TOPS of neural processing prowess.

Article Title: Apple releases iOS 18 Developer Beta 3 with Dynamic Wallpaper and other improvements
Article Text: Apple released the third developer beta of iOS 18 to developers on Monday, improving upon the new features that are set to roll out for everybody with stable release later this year.One of the most notable additions in iOS 18 beta 3 is a new dynamic wallpaper that shifts colours based on the time of day. Dark Mode received significant attention in this update, with Apple extending its reach to third-party app icons.For apps with simpler colour schemes, Apple automatically adjusts the icons, while more complex designs receive a darker tint.The Photos app saw a minor but welcome change with the addition of a dedicated "Select" button on the main interface, streamlining the process of choosing multiple images. This update also reorganised the emoji, Memoji, and stickers interface in Messages, combining them into a single, more accessible menu.Other improvements include a refined Flashlight interface with more intuitive controls for adjusting brightness and spread, and an updated RCS toggle in Messages settings that provides additional context about the feature's functionality.The iOS 18 beta is currently available only to registered developers, with a public beta expected to launch later this month. Apple plans to release the final version of iOS 18 to all users this fall, likely in September alongside new iPhone models.As with all beta software, users should expect some performance and stability issues. Apple continues to refine the operating system based on tester feedback, addressing bugs and improving overall functionality with each release.
Article Summary: The iOS 18 beta is currently available only to registered developers, with a public beta expected to launch later this month. Apple plans to release the final version of iOS 18 to all users this fall, likely in September alongside new iPhone models. As with all beta software, users should expect some performance and stability issues.

Article Title: Apple iPhone users, government has a warning on these SMSes
Article Text:
Here‚Äôs what the post reads

New Transnational #Scam Alert:

#iPhone users are receiving scam messages via

iMessage

regarding package from random accounts. Clicking on suspicious links may be avoided and read receipts may be disabled for such suspicious messages.

What does the scam message read?

India Post:

Your package has arrived at the warehouse and we attempted delivery twice but were unable to due to incomplete address information. Please update your address details within 48 hours, otherwise your package will be returned. Please update the address in the link: https://indiapostsz.top/IN

After the update is completed we will re-deliver within 24 hours, India Post!

How to spot a fake scam message?

Apple iPhone users, have you received a message allegedly about an undelivered parcel at India post warehouse? If yes, then be warned. This is a new scam where fraudsters are sending fake messages to iPhone users about packages from random accounts.Cyber Dost ‚Äì the cybersafety and cybersecurity awareness handle maintained by the Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India has warned Apple users against these new ‚Äò transnational scam ‚Äô messages.It has shared a post on X (formerly Twitter) informing users and advising them not to click on suspicious links in these messages.With some patience and intelligence, it is possible to spot scam messages. In case you receive such a message, look for signs like urgency in taking an action, poor grammar in sentence formation, suspicious links and unusual sender‚Äôs address among others.
Article Summary: Fraudsters are sending fake messages to iPhone users about packages from random accounts. Government of India has warned Apple users against these new ‚Äò transnational scam ‚Äô messages. Look for signs like urgency in taking an action, poor grammar in sentence formation, suspicious links and unusual sender‚Äôs address among others.

Article Title: Cognizant settles lawsuits against CFO and other execs filed by Wipro, pays $505,000 for settlement; read HR head's statement
Article Text: Cognizant CFO Jatin Dalal settled Wipro‚Äôs non-compete lawsuit for $505,087. Former Wipro SVP Mohammad Haque settled his lawsuit. Dalal‚Äôs arbitration occurred in Bengaluru City Civil Court. Wipro claimed Haque sent confidential files via Gmail before joining Cognizant as Senior VP. Wipro clarified actions weren‚Äôt personal. Dalal and Wipro's Saurabh Govil were satisfied with the confidential settlement.
Article Summary: Cognizant CFO Jatin Dalal settled Wipro‚Äôs non-compete lawsuit for $505,087. Former Wipra SVP Mohammad Haque settled his lawsuit. Dalal's arbitration occurred in Bengaluru City Civil Court.

Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Jio has announced a price increase for all its prepaid and postpaid plans, effective from today, July 3. The new tariff prices will be implemented across all touchpoints and channels. The most affordable plan, now priced at Rs 189, was previously Rs 155, marking a 22% rise. It's important to note that despite the price hike, the plan benefits such as call minutes and data allowance will remain unchanged.The telecom service provider has announced the price hike for 14 prepaid unlimited plans, 3 data add-on plans and 2 postpaid plans.Here‚Äôs a list of all the plans:The new tariff plans feature various price adjustments for popular monthly, bi-monthly, quarterly, annual, data add-on, and postpaid options. Monthly plans now range from Rs 189 to Rs 449 (increased from Rs 155 to Rs 399). Bi-monthly plans are priced between Rs 579 and Rs 629 for data ranging from 1.5GB/day to 2GB/day over 56 days. Quarterly plans are available from Rs 479 to Rs 1199, offering 6GB to 3GB/day over 84 days. Annual plans range from Rs 1899 to Rs 3599.Note that once the price hike goes into effect, the unlimited 5G data will only be available with plans offering 2GB/day data or above.
Article Summary: Reliance Jio announces price hike for 14 prepaid unlimited plans, 3 data add-on plans and 2 postpaid plans. Monthly plans now range from Rs 189 to Rs 449, with data offerings. Quarterly and annual plans also see adjustments. Telecom service provider ensures unchanged benefits amidst the price hike.

Article Title: Reliance Jio launches new gadget: Price, features and other details
Article Text:
JioTag Air features



JioTag Air price and availability

Reliance Jio has launched a new tracking device called the JioTag Air. Successor to last year‚Äôs JioTag, it comes with a host of new features. Unlike JioTag that worked only with the JioThings app, the JioTag Air is compatible with Apple Find My feature as well. Here are the detailsJioTag Air is a sleek asset tracker that allows you to find and track your valuables like keys, ID cards, wallets, purses, luggages, pets and other such items prone to misplacing and losing.It works with both iOS and Android devices. It is compatible with iPhones running iOS14 and above, and Android 9 and above.It is equipped with Bluetooth version 5.3 for wireless device tracking. The device has a built-in speaker and can be used to play loud sound of 90-120 db to locate lost items. As mentioned above, it works with both Apple Find My network and the JioThings app. However, a user can choose only one app at a time.Android users can pair with JioThings app and track the tagged item on this app itself. For Apple Users, once paired with Apple Find My app, JioTag Air sends continuous Bluetooth signals that can be detected by nearby devices in the Find My network like iPhones, iPads and Macs. These devices send the location of the JioTag Air to iCloud. Apple users can share tagged items on Apple Find My app with other Apple users. In addition, they can go to Apple‚Äôs Find My app and locate the item connected with the JioAirTag on map. Enabling Lost Mode will send automatic notifications to the paired Apple device when the lost item is detected in the Apple Find My network.JioTag Air is listed on the company‚Äôs website with an MRP of Rs 2,999 . But it can be purchased at Rs 1,499. Blue, Red and Grey are the colour variants of the device. Some of the bank offers listed on the site include cashback on payments using Paytm, CredUPI and select credit cards.JioAir Tag will also be available for purchase via JioMart, Reliance Digital and Amazon.
Article Summary: JioTag Air is a sleek asset tracker that allows you to find and track your valuables. It works with both iOS and Android devices. It is compatible with iPhones running iOS14 and above, and Android 9 and above. The device has a built-in speaker and can be used to play loud sound.

Bharti Airtel has announced a price hike across all its prepaid and postpaid plans. Airtel's revised tariff plans will be effective from today, July 3. As announced by the company, it has increased the price of its entry-level plans by 70 paise, 'in order to eliminate any burden on budget challenged consumers.'It must be noted here that while the plans have become costlier, benefits like data, call minutes, etc remain the same.In total, Airtel has increased the price of 15 prepaid and postpaid plans. These prices apply to all circles, including Bharti Hexacom Ltd. Circles. Reliance Jio and Vodafone Idea have also increased their tariff rates by up to 22%.The revised tariff increases the price of Rs 179 monthly plan to Rs 199. The plan will continue to offer 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMS per day. Validity of the plan remains 28 days. Similarly, the annual plan of Rs 1,799 offering 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMSes every day will now cost Rs 1,999.Airtel's daily data add-on plans now come at Rs 22 onwards (a hike of Rs 3 from the previous Rs 19).Coming to Airtel's postpaid plans, the price now ranges from Rs 449 to Rs 1,199. Daily data plans offering up to 3GB data per day now come with starting price of Rs 265.
Article Summary: Bharti Airtel has increased the price of its monthly plan to Rs 199, offering 2GB data daily, unlimited calling, and 100 SMS per day. The annual plan now costs Rs 1,999 with the same benefits. These changes aim to support budget- constrained consumers while maintaining service quality.

Article Title: Why Lucknow SuperGiants 'shared' this Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma photo with Elon Musk
Article Text:
What Virat Kohli told PM Modi

Lucknow SuperGiants official X, formerly known as Twitter, account recently replied to a post from Tesla CEO and X owner Elon Musk . In a post on X, Musk asked users to share beautiful content. Lucknow Super Giant's social media account replied to the same with a picture from the recent ICC T20 World Cup final, which was played between Indian and South Africa.The Indian team beat South Africa by 7-run to win the World Cup, which ended India's 13-year-long wait for an ICC World Cup trophy."Would be lovely to see more accounts on ùïè simply posting beautiful content x.com/evalovesdesign‚Ä¶," wrote Musk. Quoting this Elon Musk post, Lucknow SuperGiants replied, "Okay done ü•∞," and along with these words shared the picture of Indian cricket team captain Rohit Sharma hugging star batsman Virat Kohli .These pictures of Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma hugging are said to have broken the internet. The pictures shared on various social media platforms including X, Instagram and Facebook have got millions of likes.Talking about the hug at the felicitation ceremony, Kohli said "We have been playing for the last 15 years, this is the first time, I see Rohit so emotional - he was crying, I was crying, a hug between both of us - I will never forget that day." The felicitation function was organised by the BCCI at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.Kohli said that winning the T20 World Cup 2024 was a special moment for him as he had not realised the gravity of the moment when he was part of M.S Dhoni's team which won the 2011 ODI World Cup at this same venue. "I was 21-22 at that time and did not realise why the senior players were getting so emotional. After winning this World Cup, I have realised how special this is," said Kohli. He added that he had instantly realised that it was time for him to say goodbye to the format and make way for youngsters.During the Indian team's interaction with Prime Minister Narendra Modi at his residence on July 4, Kohli said, "We lived each ball at the end, we can't explain what was going on inside. We lost hope at one moment, then Hardik took a wicket and then with each ball, we got the energy. I am happy that I was able to contribute to the team in such a big game after a tough time. I won't be able to forget it. I was happy that I was able to take the team to a fighting total."
Article Summary: Lucknow SuperGiants official X, formerly known as Twitter, replied to a post from Tesla CEO and X owner Elon Musk. Musk asked users to share beautiful content. Lucknow Super Giant's social media account replied to the same with a picture from the recent ICC T20 World Cup final, which was played between Indian and South Africa.

Article Title: Prince William's boarding school bans smartphones, mandates Nokia phone for students
Article Text:
What does the school‚Äôs new policy on smartphone ban say?

UK government‚Äôs guidance on smartphone use by kids

In a major move, a posh boarding school in the UK has decided to swap its students‚Äô smartphones for the classic Nokia phones, reports CBS News. The policy is based on guidelines from the UK government that allows school principals to enact smartphone bans on students during the school day.Eton College , the historic and elite British boarding school is located near the royal palace in Windsor. Prince William and Harry, Ian Fleming, Tom Hiddleston and novelist George Orwell are some of its notable alumni.As per the report, parents of first-year students at Eton College were informed about the changes in a letter. It reportedly said that the incoming 13-year-old boarders must transfer their SIM cards to offline Nokia phones given by schools. The phone will only be able to make phone calls and send text messages.The report quotes a school spokesperson who said ‚ÄúEton routinely reviews our mobile phone and devices policy to balance the benefits and challenges that technology brings to schools.‚Äù He further added that those joining in Year 9, essentially the equivalent of freshman year in high school for American students, ‚Äúwill receive a 'brick' phone for use outside the school day, as well as a school-issued iPad to support academic study.‚ÄùAccording to Ofcom, the UK government's communications regulator, 97% of children have their own smartphone phone by the age of 12. In the new guidelines issued in February this year, the government advised all schools to ‚Äúhave a behaviour policy which is aligned with the school‚Äôs legal duties and standards relating to the welfare of children. It further stated that boarding schools and residential schools should prohibit the use of mobile phones throughout the teaching day, among other things.
Article Summary: The policy is based on guidelines from the UK government that allows school principals to enact smartphone bans on students during the school day. Parents of first-year students at Eton College were informed about the changes in a letter. The incoming 13-year-old boarders must transfer their SIM cards to offline Nokia phones given by schools.

Article Title: Apple shares these 8 tips to protect your iPhone, iPad and Mac from online scams
Article Text:
What is a Social engineering scam?

Fraudulent emails and other messages that look like they're from legitimate companies, including Apple.

Misleading pop-ups and ads that say your device has a security problem.

Scam phone calls or voicemails that impersonate Apple Support, Apple partners, and other well known or trusted entities or individuals.

Fake promotions that offer free products and prizes.

Unwanted Calendar invitations and subscriptions.



How to protect your Apple account and devices

Never share personal data or security information like passwords or security codes, and never agree to enter them into a webpage that someone directs you to.

Protect your Apple ID. Use two-factor authentication, always keep your contact information secure and up to date, and never share your Apple ID password or verification codes with anyone. Apple never asks for this information to provide support.

password or verification codes with anyone. Apple never asks for this information to provide support. Never use Apple Gift Cards to make payments to other people.

Learn how to identify legitimate Apple emails about your App Store or iTunes Store purchases. If you send or receive money with Apple Cash (U.S. only), treat it like any other private transaction.

Learn how to keep your Apple devices and data secure.

Download software only from sources you can trust.

Don't follow links or open or save attachments in suspicious or unsolicited messages.

Don't answer suspicious phone calls or messages claiming to be from Apple. Instead, contact Apple directly through our official support channels.

Apple has shared crucial tips on how to recognize and avoid falling victim to scams like SMS threat, phishing and more. The iPhone maker has updated its security support document that provides tips to avoid scams and learn what to do if you receive suspicious emails, phone calls, or other messages.Apple says that scams like phishing and SMS threats are called social engineering scams - a type of targeted attack that relies on impersonation, deception, and manipulation to gain access to users‚Äô personal data.The Cupertino-based company has also listed means that the scammers can use to trick victims into sharing information or giving them money. These include:Apple has also shared a few tips that a user can do to avoid scams that target Apple accounts and devices. These include
Article Summary: Apple has shared crucial tips on how to recognize and avoid falling victim to scams like SMS threat, phishing and more. iPhone maker has updated its security support document that provides tips to avoid scams and learn what to do if you receive suspicious emails, phone calls, or other messages.

Article Title: Google Fi protects users from SIM swaps with new ‚ÄúNumber Lock" feature
Article Text:
How to activate the feature

Google Fi wireless has introduced a security feature called ‚Äò Number Lock ‚Äô. This new feature empowers users to take control and prevent a growing cybersecurity threat ‚Äì SIM swapping .SIM swapping occurs when a malicious actor convinces your carrier to transfer your phone number to a new SIM card in their possession. This can grant them access to your calls, texts, two-factor authentication codes, and potentially even financial accounts linked to your number.Google Fi's Number Lock acts as a digital safeguard against SIM swapping attempts.Once activated, this feature essentially locks your phone number to your existing SIM card. Any attempts to transfer your number to a new SIM, even through contacting customer service, will be denied unless you disable Number Lock. Enabling this feature provides an extra layer of security, making it significantly harder for fraudsters to hijack your phone number.Activating Number Lock is a simple process. Google Fi users can manage the feature through their online account or the Fi app. Once enabled, you'll receive a confirmation notification, giving you peace of mind that your number is locked and protected.
Article Summary: Google Fi's Number Lock acts as a digital safeguard against SIM swapping attempts. Once activated, this feature essentially locks your phone number to your existing SIM card. Any attempts to transfer your number to a new SIM, even through contacting customer service, will be denied unless you disable Number Lock.

Article Title: Here‚Äôs your chance to buy Zomato Gold membership at Rs 30 for 6 months
Article Text:
Zomato Gold benefits



Paytm CEO Vijay Shekhar Sharma gives a shout-out to Zomato ad

Zomato is celebrating its 16th anniversary this year with an exciting offer on its Gold membership. The food delivery platform has announced an offer to buy Zomato Gold membership for 6 months at just Rs 30. But, there‚Äôs an important catch to it. The offer does not work for existing Gold customers. Only those who don‚Äôt have a Zomato Gold membership can avail it.Zomato Gold membership gives free delivery on all restaurants within 7km for orders above Rs 199. There is an additional discount of up to 30% above all existing offers at 20,000+ partner restaurants across India.For those unaware, Zomato was originally founded in the year 2008 by Deepinder Goyal and Pankaj Chaddah as FoodieBay. It is headquartered in Gurugram, Haryana and operates in more than 1000 cities across the country.To celebrate its 16th birthday, Zomato has shared an interesting, full page ad in the Times of India newspaper. The ad features a large photograph of its founder and CEO, Deepinder Goyal, along with other top executives. The text, written in Hindi, reads ‚Äú16th janamdin par aap sabhi ko apna pyar barsane ke liye koti koti dhanyavaad‚Äù (On our 16th birthday, a big thanks to all of you for showering us with love).The ad caught the attention of many, including Paytm CEO Vijay Shekhar Sharma who praised this Zomato ad. Sharing an image of the ad on X (formerly Twitter), Sharma extended his best wishes to Goyal and the entire Zomato team, hoping to see more praiseworthy marketing campaigns in the future.The post is written in Hindi which roughly translates to ‚ÄúOn the 16th birthday of Zomato, heartiest congratulations to the chief Mr. Deepinder ji and all the members of his executive! üëèüèºüëèüèºMay God grant us such praiseworthy advertisements always ü§ó.‚Äù
Article Summary: Zomato Gold membership gives free delivery on all restaurants within 7km for orders above Rs 199. There is an additional discount of up to 30% above all existing offers at 20,000+ partner restaurants across India. Zomato was originally founded in the year 2008 by Deepinder Goyal and Pankaj Chaddah.

Article Title: Here‚Äôs the ‚Äòhole‚Äô story: Once upon a time, there were roads in Mumbai ...
Article Text: MUMBAI: Craters have sprung up on roads and highways citywide, exposing authorities‚Äô hollow promises of monsoon preparedness. Large potholes near Nahur east station are causing autorickshaws to wobble dangerously, and leading pedestrians to trip.More shockingly , the new Turbhe flyover , which was inaugurated as recently as Dec 2023 , has been unable to withstand its very first monsoon.A 50m stretch of the road is in bad shape due to potholes at SionPanvel highway in Navi Mumbai. So expansive are these craters that a cluster of small cars could comfortably swim amid the rain.
Article Summary: Large potholes near Nahur east station are causing autorickshaws to wobble dangerously, and leading pedestrians to trip. So expansive are these craters that a cluster of small cars could comfortably swim amid the rain. More shockingly, the new Turbhe flyover has been unable to withstand its very first monsoon.

Article Title: Muda scam: BJP releases ‚Äòvital documents‚Äô, says CM Siddaramaiah is corrupt
Article Text:
BJP state president BY Vijayendra and MLA CN Ashwath Narayan speak to reporters in Bengaluru on Wednesday

Dodgy timeline

BJP Plans 'mega' protest in Mysuru

BENGALURU: Opposition BJP intensified its attack on chief minister Siddaramaiah , releasing a set of documents to ‚Äúsubstantiate‚Äù claims that Mysuru Urban Development Authority (Muda) had favoured the CM‚Äôs wife by illegally allotting land.Presenting what he called ‚Äúvital documents‚Äù, Karnataka BJP president BY Vijayendra alleged serious violations and discrepancies involving Siddaramaiah and his family and called for him to resign.‚ÄúIf any chief minister engineered a scam while being at the helm and sought compensation from his own govt, it is Siddaramaiah,‚Äù Vijayendra said.He proceeded to outline specifics of the alleged scam, pointing to irregularities in allotment of land to Siddaramaiah‚Äôs wife, Parvathi alias Parvathamma. He said as per rules, she should have been allotted only two alternative 60x40ft sites for her 3.2 acres that was acquired, but instead, she was allotted 14 sites. ‚ÄúThis is totally illegal,‚Äù Vijayendra said.Vijayendra claimed Siddaramaiah did not declare these properties in his election affidavit in 2013, calling it a ‚Äúblatant violation‚Äù of Representation of the People Act 1951 and the model code of conduct (MCC) which was in effect at that time. ‚ÄúBJP is contemplating filing a formal complaint with the Election Commission of India,‚Äù he said.Vijayendra also highlighted the timeline and legal discrepancies surrounding the acquisition and subsequent transactions involving Siddaramaiah‚Äôs relatives. ‚ÄúThe land was acquired by Muda before it was purchased by CM‚Äôs brother-in-law and later given to CM‚Äôs wife through a gift deed,‚Äù he said. He disputed Siddaramaiah‚Äôs claims of receiving sites whose market value was far lower than the price of land Muda acquired. ‚ÄúHe got a total of 14 sites each worth more than Rs 2 crore,‚Äù he said, challenging the discrepancy between guidance values and actual market prices.Disputing remarks Siddaramaiah‚Äôs associates had made at a press conference that Muda began the acquisition process in 1992, denotified the land in 1998 and that it was purchased in 2004 by the CM‚Äôs brother-in-law, he said: ‚ÄúThe RTC (primary record of land ownership), clearly shows the land was already acquired by Muda. If this is true, the first question is how CM‚Äôs brother-in-law purchased the land that was in Muda‚Äôs possession. The gift deed also wrongfully states the acquired land is farmland. On the date the land was gifted, it was already converted and was not agricultural land.‚ÄùVijayendra accused urban development minister Byrathi Suresh of shielding Siddaramaiah and implicating officials through strategic transfers. ‚ÄúMore than Rs 5,000 crore worth of sites allotted illegally to influential people were protected through these transfers. Several important files at Muda have been taken away to protect the CM.‚ÄùAccusing the govt of misconduct and deception, he said: ‚ÄúSiddaramaiah, who boasts of ensuring social justice now stands exposed.‚ÄùBJP will hold a ‚Äúmega‚Äù rally in Mysuru on July 12 to protest the Muda scam . Protesters will demand withdrawal of sites that were illegally distributed and allocation of sites to the poor. They will also reiterate demands for a CBI investigation into these irregularities. Vijayendra said BJP will also raise the issue during the legislative session beginning next week.Muda scam: BJP releases ‚Äò vital documents ‚Äô, says CM is corruptPROOF OF WRONGDOING? BJP state president BY Vijayendra and MLA CN Ashwath Narayan speak to reporters in Bengaluru on Wednesday.
Article Summary: Muda scam: BJP releases ‚Äò vital documents ‚Äô, says CM is corrupt. BJP will hold a ‚Äòmega‚Äô rally in Mysuru on July 12 to protest the Muda scam. Protesters will demand withdrawal of sites that were illegally distributed. They will also reiterate demands for a CBI investigation into these irregularities.
